short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show Axe Core results in the browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Evaluates web pages for accessibility using the Axe Core rules engine. When you click the plugin icon it pops up a sidebar on the page with a list of issues that might make the current web page difficult for disabled people to use. You can click on each issue in the listing to highlight the element on the web page that caused the issue.
